content.webTitle: Horse racing: Liberty Seeker one to follow

fields.headline: Liberty Seeker one to follow
fields.bodyText: Liberty Seeker, who has taken on a new lease of life since sent jumping with trainer Peter Niven, looks worth an interest on his return to Flat racing at Ayr today. Successful on his last two starts over fences, Liberty Seeker (4.15) has the assistance of Paul Hanagan in a 1m7f handicap which will not take a lot of winning. Manaar (3.45), who figures among the entries for Saturday's totesport International Handicap, should enjoy a confidence boosting victory. He ran his best race for a long time when touched off by True Night at Ascot.
